  8#ifndef vsip_core_mpi_distributed_block_hpp_
  9#define vsip_core_mpi_distributed_block_hpp_
 10
 11#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 12#include <vsip/core/map_fwd.hpp>
 13#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 14#include <vsip/core/domain_utils.hpp>
 15#include <vsip/core/user_storage.hpp>
 16#include <vsip/core/parallel/get_local_view.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/core/parallel/proxy_local_block.hpp>
 18
 19namespace vsip
 20{
 21namespace impl
 22{
 23namespace mpi
 24{
 25
 26template <typename Block,
 27	  typename Map>
 28class Distributed_block
 29  : public impl::Ref_count<Distributed_block<Block, Map> >
 30{
 31  // Compile-time values and types.
 32public:
 33  static dimension_type const dim = Block::dim;
 34
 35  typedef typename Block::value_type           value_type;
 36  typedef typename Block::reference_type       reference_type;
 37  typedef typename Block::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
 38
 39  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::complex_type impl_complex_type;
 40  typedef Storage<impl_complex_type, value_type>     impl_storage_type;
 41  typedef typename impl_storage_type::type           impl_data_type;
 42  typedef typename impl_storage_type::const_type     impl_const_data_type;
 43
 44  typedef Map                                  map_type;
 45
 46  // Non-standard typedefs:
 47  typedef Block                                local_block_type;
 48  typedef typename Block_layout<local_block_type>::layout_type
 49                                               local_LP;
 50  typedef Proxy_local_block<dim, value_type, local_LP>  proxy_local_block_type;
 51
 52  // Private compile-time values and types.
 53private:
 54  enum private_type {};
 55  typedef typename impl::Complex_value_type<value_type, private_type>::ptr_type
 56          uT_ptr;
 57
 58  // Constructors and destructor.
 59public:
 60  typedef typename impl::Complex_value_type<value_type, private_type>::type uT;
 61
 62  Distributed_block(Domain<dim> const& dom, Map const& map = Map())
 63    : map_           (map),
 64      proc_          (local_processor()),
 65      sb_            (map_.subblock(proc_)),
 66      subblock_      (NULL)
 67  {
 68    map_.impl_apply(dom);
 69    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
 70      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
 71
 72    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
 73      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
 74                           : empty_domain<dim>();
 75
 76    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom);
 77  }
 78
 79  Distributed_block(Domain<dim> const& dom, value_type value,
 80		    Map const& map = Map())
 81    : map_           (map),
 82      proc_          (local_processor()),
 83      sb_            (map_.subblock(proc_)),
 84      subblock_      (NULL)
 85  {
 86    map_.impl_apply(dom);
 87    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
 88      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
 89
 90    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
 91      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
 92                           : empty_domain<dim>();
 93
 94    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, value);
 95  }
 96
 97  Distributed_block(
 98    Domain<dim> const& dom, 
 99    value_type* const  ptr,
100    Map const&         map = Map())
101    : map_           (map),
102      proc_          (local_processor()),
103      sb_            (map_.subblock()),
104      subblock_      (NULL)
105  {
106    map_.impl_apply(dom);
107    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
108      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
109
110    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
111      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
112                           : empty_domain<dim>();
113
114    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, ptr);
115  }
116
117  Distributed_block(
118    Domain<dim> const& dom, 
119    uT_ptr const       pointer,
120    Map const&         map = Map())
121    : map_           (map),
122      proc_          (local_processor()),
123      sb_            (map_.subblock()),
124      subblock_      (NULL)
125  {
126    map_.impl_apply(dom);
127    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
128      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
129
130    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
131      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
132                           : empty_domain<dim>();
133
134    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, pointer);
135  }
136
137  Distributed_block(
138    Domain<dim> const& dom, 
139    uT_ptr const       real_pointer,
140    uT_ptr const       imag_pointer,
141    Map const&         map = Map())
142    : map_           (map),
143      proc_          (local_processor()),
144      sb_            (map_.subblock()),
145      subblock_      (NULL)
146  {
147    map_.impl_apply(dom);
148    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
149      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
150
151    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
152      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
153                           : empty_domain<dim>();
154
155    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, real_pointer, imag_pointer);
156  }
157
158
159  ~Distributed_block()
160  {
161    if (subblock_)
162    {
163      // PROFILE: issue a warning if subblock is captured.
164      subblock_->decrement_count();
165    }
166  }
167    
168  // Data accessors.
169public:
170  // get() on a distributed_block is a broadcast.  The processor
171  // owning the index broadcasts the value to the other processors in
172  // the data parallel group.
173  value_type get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW
174  {
175    // Optimize uni-processor and replicated cases.
176    if (    Type_equal<Map, Global_map<1> >::value
177        ||  vsip::num_processors() == 1
178	|| (   Type_equal<Map, Replicated_map<1> >::value
179	    && map_.subblock() != no_subblock))
180      return subblock_->get(idx);
181
182    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<1>(idx));
183    processor_type pr = *(map_.processor_begin(sb));
184    value_type     val = value_type(); // avoid -Wall 'may not be initialized'
185
186    if (pr == proc_)
187    {
188      assert(map_.subblock() == sb);
189      index_type lidx = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx);
190      val = subblock_->get(lidx);
191    }
192
193    map_.impl_comm().broadcast(pr, &val, 1);
194
195    return val;
196  }
197
198  value_type get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1) const VSIP_NOTHROW
199  {
200    // Optimize uni-processor and replicated cases.
201    if (    Type_equal<Map, Global_map<2> >::value
202        ||  vsip::num_processors() == 1
203	|| (   Type_equal<Map, Replicated_map<2> >::value
204	    && map_.subblock() != no_subblock))
205      return subblock_->get(idx0, idx1);
206
207    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(
208				Index<2>(idx0, idx1));
209    processor_type pr = *(map_.processor_begin(sb));
210    value_type     val = value_type(); // avoid -Wall 'may not be initialized'
211
212    if (pr == proc_)
213    {
214      assert(map_.subblock() == sb);
215      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
216      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
217      val = subblock_->get(l_idx0, l_idx1);
218    }
219
220    map_.impl_comm().broadcast(pr, &val, 1);
221
222    return val;
223  }
224
225  value_type get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2)
226    const VSIP_NOTHROW
227  {
228    // Optimize uni-processor and replicated cases.
229    if (    Type_equal<Map, Global_map<3> >::value
230        ||  vsip::num_processors() == 1
231	|| (   Type_equal<Map, Replicated_map<3> >::value
232	    && map_.subblock() != no_subblock))
233      return subblock_->get(idx0, idx1, idx2);
234
235    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(
236				Index<3>(idx0, idx1, idx2));
237    processor_type pr = *(map_.processor_begin(sb));
238    value_type     val = value_type(); // avoid -Wall 'may not be initialized'
239
240    if (pr == proc_)
241    {
242      assert(map_.subblock() == sb);
243      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
244      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
245      index_type l_idx2 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(2, idx2);
246      val = subblock_->get(l_idx0, l_idx1, l_idx2);
247    }
248
249    map_.impl_comm().broadcast(pr, &val, 1);
250
251    return val;
252  }
253
254
255  // put() on a distributed_block is executed only on the processor
256  // owning the index.
257  void put(index_type idx, value_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
258  {
259    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<1>(idx));
260
261    if (map_.subblock() == sb)
262    {
263      index_type lidx = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx);
264      subblock_->put(lidx, val);
265    }
266  }
267
268  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, value_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
269  {
270    index_type sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<2>(idx0, idx1));
271
272    if (map_.subblock() == sb)
273    {
274      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
275      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
276      subblock_->put(l_idx0, l_idx1, val);
277    }
278  }
279
280  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2, value_type val)
281    VSIP_NOTHROW
282  {
283    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(
284				Index<3>(idx0, idx1, idx2));
285
286    if (map_.subblock() == sb)
287    {
288      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
289      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
290      index_type l_idx2 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(2, idx2);
291      subblock_->put(l_idx0, l_idx1, l_idx2, val);
292    }
293  }
294
295
296  // Support Direct_data interface.
297public:
298  impl_data_type       impl_data()       VSIP_NOTHROW
299  { return subblock_->impl_data(); }
300
301  impl_const_data_type impl_data() const VSIP_NOTHROW
302  { return subblock_->impl_data(); }
303
304  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type D, dimension_type d)
305    const VSIP_NOTHROW
306  { return subblock_->impl_stride(D, d); }
307
308
309  // Accessors.
310public:
311  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
312  {
313    length_type size = 1;
314    for (dimension_type d = 0; d < dim; ++d)
315      size *= size_[d];
316    return size;
317  }
318  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
319    const VSIP_NOTHROW
320  {
321    assert(block_dim == dim);
322    assert(d < dim);
323    return size_[d];
324  }
325
326  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
327    { return map_; }
328
329  // length_type num_local_blocks() const { return num_subblocks_; }
330
331  Block& get_local_block() const
332  {
333    assert(subblock_ != NULL);
334    return *subblock_;
335  }
336
337  index_type subblock() const { return sb_; }
338
339  void assert_local(index_type sb) const
340    { assert(sb == sb_ && subblock_ != NULL); }
341
342  // User storage functions.
343public:
344  void admit(bool update = true) VSIP_NOTHROW
345    { subblock_->admit(update); }
346
347  void release(bool update = true) VSIP_NOTHROW
348    { subblock_->release(update); }
349
350  void release(bool update, value_type*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
351    { subblock_->release(update, pointer); }
352  void release(bool update, uT*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
353    { subblock_->release(update, pointer); }
354  void release(bool update, uT*& real_pointer, uT*& imag_pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
355    { subblock_->release(update, real_pointer, imag_pointer); }
356
357  void find(value_type*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
358    { subblock_->find(pointer); }
359  void find(uT*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
360    { subblock_->find(pointer); }
361  void find(uT*& real_pointer, uT*& imag_pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
362    { subblock_->find(real_pointer, imag_pointer); }
363
364  void rebind(value_type* pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
365    { subblock_->rebind(pointer); }
366  void rebind(uT* pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
367    { subblock_->rebind(pointer); }
368  void rebind(uT* real_pointer, uT* imag_pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
369    { subblock_->rebind(real_pointer, imag_pointer); }
370
371  enum user_storage_type user_storage() const VSIP_NOTHROW
372  { return subblock_->user_storage(); }
373
374  bool admitted() const VSIP_NOTHROW
375    { return subblock_->admitted(); }
376
377  // Member data.
378public:
379  map_type              map_;
380  processor_type	proc_;			// This processor in comm.
381  index_type   		sb_;
382  Block*		subblock_;
383  length_type	        size_[dim];
384};
385
386} // namespace vsip::impl::mpi
387} // namespace vsip::impl
388} // namespace vsip
